acceptance-test-run.title: Verify all of the Footer navigation links open correctly
acceptance-test-run.name: Verify all of the Footer navigation links open correctly

test-group.name: [1] {navFooterItem=RSS}
Given the user is on the DOL home page
When the user clicks on the {RSS} within the Footer
Then the {RSS} page should open correctly
[2] {navFooterItem=Disclaimer}
Given the user is on the DOL home page
When the user clicks on the {Disclaimer} within the Footer
Then the ｟Disclaimer｠ page should open correctly
